originalText.text:
I recently had an appointment with Dr. Buckholz regarding some concerns I had about my health. From the moment I walked into the office, I felt welcomed and at ease. Dr. Smith's demeanor was warm and reassuring, immediately putting me at ease.

During the appointment, Dr. Smith listened attentively to my concerns and took the time to thoroughly explain everything to me. When the lab results came back indicating steatosis, Dr. Smith didn't just deliver the diagnosis; he provided detailed information about the condition, its implications, and outlined a comprehensive plan for managing it.

originalText.text: Dr. Buckholz was very attentive and patient.  He provided detailed explanations and possible solutions.  Very pleasant and easy to confide in.

originalText.text: Very pleasant and explained everything in detail and listened carefully. Totally recommend him!
